title: General
stimulusHtml:
4 points maximum

For each:

Unit structure (with description): 1 point


Organization/Assembly: 2 points maximum* (*1 may be general, second specific to larger structure)


Function/Benefit: 1 point maximum

Structures --> Emergent properties (only grade first 3)

Unit Structure—Organization/Assembly (must demonstrate organization to inner membrane):

  • Phospholipids and proteins (or component later in sequence)—describe at least one

  • → organization of proteins (specific respiratory molecules together) → folding → membrane (cristae must be uniquely mitochondrial)

Function/Benefit:

  • Impermeable to H+ forming gradient

  • Proximity of Kreb’s Cycle to the membrane

  • Electron transport
descriptions:
